mapper.insert: insert into sale (s_id, c_id, receiver, tel, address, total, s_date) values(#{s_id}, #{c_id}, #{receiver}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{total}, now())
mapper.select: select si.i_id, i.name, i.photo, i.price, si.quantity from sale_items si join items i on si.i_id=i.i_id where si.s_id=#{s_id}
select count(*) from sale where c_id in (select c_id from cart where u_id=#{u_id})

select s.*, i.photo, i.name from sale s LEFT JOIN sale_items si ON s.s_id = si.s_id LEFT JOIN items i ON si.i_id = i.i_id where s.c_id in (select c_id from cart where u_id=#{u_id}) order by s.s_date desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update sale set s_status=#{s_status} where s_id=#{s_id}
